Though we just received this for ourselves and one of our kids & family in another state, we haven't figured out completely how to use it - but LOVE what we have figured out.  We look forward to using it to keep in touch much better with our family located several states away from us!  Thank you!

It does all the usual Echo Dot things: keeping lists “Alexa, add milk to my shopping list”. “Alexa add pay bills to my to do list”. “Alexa start a menu plan list”.  “Alexa text John Jones”.  All that and shows me my Ring camera, shows recipes so I can look at them while I’m cooking.  My granddaughter plays games with it.  “Alexa play Are You Smarter than a Fifth grader?”  We love it!  Great productivity tool.
Exactly what I wanted, and integrated almost instantly with my Ring doorbell.  I love the recipes and news stories which flashes across the screen.
I love this product.  I use it everyday. I use Alexa to play my music, to tell me jokes, to call my daughter, etc . This product has nice speakers.
shes fun to play with. we have her in our kitchen and its perfect for videos online or listening to music. Works well for timers, or making lists. very handy!

I decided to get this device for my mother. It is easy for her to ask Alexa simple questions. I’m still trying to add new skills to the device. I wish the speaker was in the front instead of the back. Overall, I am glad I decided to get it.

ENJOYING OUR NEW ALEXA....8 INCH SCREEN IS PERFECT FOR REVIEWING RECIPES!  IT DOES SO MUCH: NEWS, GAMES, JOKES, STOCKS; LEARNING SOMETHING NEW EVERYDAY! I WILL  DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS ALEXA TO MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS.
It is way better than my Echo 5, which I still use but its in the kitchen.  I can play music and send thru to both units, the screen is bigger and more features that I can use!!!  Great product!!!
The Echo Show is everything it claims to be. The sound & picture quality is excellent! The photo show is wonderful. I highly recommend this device.
The Echo Show 8 is now my favorite Alexa device. I want a screen on all of them. Just need an Alexa TV. Haven't tried the calling feature yet, but can't wait.

This is a great upgrade from the Show 5. The sound is really great with really good bass as a standalone unit (although I connected it to our home stereo). Within minutes I had it set up with Amazon, SiriusXM, Spotify, and Pandora through the easy to use Alexa Android app. The display is vibrant and clear, and the basic wallpapers are really nice (I just chose the Art category, and all have been great so far). Great product!!
This didn’t work it had ghost writing all over it and couldn’t even get it set up.  They wouldn’t send out a new one at the price I had purchased it for from them, they wanted more money.
An exceptional upgrade over other smart home hubs. Great display and integration with other smart products through Alexa skills. Very easy to set up.
It was fairly easy to set up and operate.  nice to see/talk with family and friends. also has some good information with the temperature in the area.
I gave this as a gift to my son and daughter -in -law who both are enjoying it a lot.  They tell me the find something new to do with it every day.
Love added screen space and great new design of Amazon Show.  Fast and easy to set up. Sound is better that older version also. Excelllent upgrade.

Video call quality is non existent...facebook video chat has better quality and that says a lot. Small for any other video usage. Built in speakers are trash and o can’t figure out any other point to this thing. Read a book maybe? Sub par tablet, save your money, skip this, and get an iPad
Quality audio and video. I give it⭐⭐⭐⭐ Hulu isn't working and don't see ANY way of fixing it.  I use Hulu a LOT.  I need this feature.  Otherwise I'd give it⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
It’s cool to have and be able to control all my smart devices. I will say that I expected more functionality and the ability to add 3rd party video chat apps but was unable to do so.

When my favorite likes is the Sound... Great volume, but could use a little more highs.  I have the echo show 5, 8 and 10. And the one thing that aggravates me the most. Is they do not all have the same capability. Amazon all 3 these products should be able to use the clocks the features the same way. Really need to get that update started. It's like you have 3 different departments working on 3 the same projects.
Very easy to set up. Linked up with other echo fast and easy.  Not as full sounding as the full sized u it's. Clear screen and super easy to use. Great price at $79.99.
Does not work as advertised. Is simply an IP appliance that needs your mobile phone to function. Save your money. Don’t bother. Use your cell phone with FaceTime.

I enjoy watching Amazon movies on this little thing. The sound quality is great and the screen is pretty clear. I'm able to control my lights, set alarms and play music for my dog while I'm gone. I'm also able to snoop on my dog with the camera and talk to her through my Alexa app on my phone. The only thing I wish I could get rid of is the "Try this" suggestions. They're really irrelevant to me and typically pretty redundant.
I have not hooked this up yet. Received at Christmas. I have one at a different house and hope I can use alexa account for 2 different locations.
love most everything...sound quality, looking at my photos, video chatting, videos,etc.  alarm wakes to light first then sound.  yes the suggestions are VERY distracting.  overall very happy though
I like my Alexa show 8. It's connected to my blink system. I was able to view my blink camera from my kitchen while someone was knocking on my front door.
the show is much better than i expected.  i use it in the kitchen and it makes a great timer for cooking.  if you enable hulu integration you can also use it to watch live tv

I like the fact that I can connect to the Internet and that it has a web browser on it but it needs to be easier to connect to the ring doorbell so I can actually see who is outside the door through the ring doorbell

great buy,  not to big not to small just right and man the sound is great, alexa sometimes has issue on voice and lag of commands, no issue with internet on my end. great features especially with the Ring to show me the cameras. best investment when cooking needing some jams or a recipe
Very handy for recipes in the kitchen.  Integrates well into the Alexa system.  Sound is okay, but I'm not an audiophile.  Don't buy at full price, as many sales are going on.
So far I love this! Snyc'd w/ my camera's Pandora , phone. Uploaded pics It does everything but make me a tea! Its fun to play w/ and find out more of what I can do.

Setup is fairy easy but better or more detailed instructions would be nice.  We bought one for our parents & since they aren’t as tech savvy they really had a hard time.  We had a frustrating time figuring out how to get our contacts loaded & how to actually make a video call. The online setup only takes you so far. It would be nice if you could turn the ringer up or change the sound. Unless I’m standing right next to it I can’t hear it ring.
Don't like that I ask "What's new on Netflix" and respond with different music from Prime series. Not exactly what I expected from a smart device.
This is recommended for everyone, but it’s especially a must for grand parents or great grandparents as seeing and taking is so much better then just talking.
Love the fast response, words showing on the screen for songs and recipes.  Songs show words so we can sing along.  Instant news .  Clock on screen.  Love it!

My only complaint is that I CANNOT make the clock number bigger!!! Because  Sometimes I just want to look at the clock from a distance. I don’t want anyone knows that I’m keeping time...by asking Alexa out loud.Thanks

Absolutely impressed by this product. Had spent the week at my brother on vacation and they already had one. Was pretty impressed with the capabilities and purchased one for myself. Sound quality is amazing, plenty of bass when listening to music. Display is impressive as well. Sometimes I speak too fast for Alexa to pick up what I said, but it’s not often. Highly recommend if you’re considering it.
The echo 3rd generation sounds way better- I find that Built in speakers with displays usually compromises sound quality vs stand alone. The bass suffers.
I liked the first one but I like this one much better. Better sound and better picture quality. A little larger screen. Nice screen saver choices.
I got this as a gift from my daughter and I absolutely love it!Best part is video calling and see that person like the are sitting in front of you!
This is so wonderful to have in our kitchen.  I can send messages to my kids on their Echo Dot's in their rooms.  No more screaming up the stairs when I need them!
wko  the plug it in not porable
nothing to dislike. Great product. Works beautifully! I have an echo in every room. Love how it now has security for the house, when I am away. My busiest echo is the one in the kitchen.
no manual configuration from amazon they have to recognise camera as well as cloud app recognition . many cameras will not work because of this.
I love how it pairs with my ring cameras and door bell. My favorite part is that it will announce there is motion at my door. Looks good in my kitchen.
Great item show 8 was a awesome fit sound quality is great. We really like the fact you can slide a physical switch to cover the camera for privacy.
Love this product. Great sound. Perfect for our kitchen. Very satisfied. We also have the Echo Show 5 on our nightstands in the bedroom.

This unit has great sound and the HD picture quality is awesome! The kids love chatting with their Grandmother, since its so far to go for a visit. We love all the things we can do with the Echo Show!
I bit smaller than the previous version but that makes it fit a bit better. Same great Alexa voice recognition. Great music  plays from the fantastics speakers . Love it

We got 2 of these for my daughter's birthday. As we are separated right now by what is going on in the world this is the only way she can connect with her dad which is very important to her. Her face lit up when was able to see him and talk to him for the first time with this device. It was worth every penny for that smile.
It is USED. The seal on the box was cut open. I took out the SHOW 8 and the housing was severely scratched. It's metal so it's more like gouges.
Had a Show 5 and upgraded to this during the BF sale. Great sound and excellent picture quality.
Enjoy our pictures, great for weather. Sounds pretty good. Like the message, phone calling and announcement features. I am still learning, lot of trial and error. Yes I bought the book too.!!

Is like our echo but with screen, also you can control your smart devices + view your security cameras, is a skype, you can talk echo to echo, even do phone calls, is a must have in the house, and specially for elders, and the price is just right. ohhh almost forgot, you can watch movies, videos and learn kitchen recipes.

I liked it until I started using it as a bluetooth speaker for my phone. Everytime  it connects it says " now connected to Samsung Galaxy s8 active" it's super annoying and loud next to my bed and apparently can't be turned off or changed to a simple beep like EVERY OTHER BLUETOOTH SPEAKER EVER MADE.  The odds are pretty good it will thrown into the wall very soon. Last Echo device I'll ever purchase.
Started with an echo and a couple of dots. Upgraded dots to show 5s. Then got show 8.  Love them all. Like the shows best. The 8 is super!! Recommend!!
Love this in my office to check the door camera and watch the news while I’m working.  Really convenient size and style for a modern office desk space.
Seems like this little eye on the world can do anything, answer any question, do a plethera of tasks.All in all, a great addition to our kitchen information center.
Awesome! Didn’t even need to set it up to integrate with my ring doorbell camera, it just knew. I love that it plays the words to the songs I’m listening to.

I don’t have to run up or downstairs to talk to my Husband. I put the 1st echo in our room upstairs and the echo show is In the kitchen so I can just tell the one to announce to the other if I need to tell him something

First off viperamd64 shows no pictures of echo show 8 with a large clock.  Know why?  The device cannot be setup that way.I wanted a voice operated large display clock.  I thought it would be like the echo show 5 but it is not.
If your thinking about buying this item all I can say is buy it! My entire family wants this new model now! I want one for my classroom as well.

This is the best thing I have ever bought! The sound is amazing on it, the picture quality is awesome. When you’re listening to a song the lyrics show up. There’s a built in privacy cover for the camera and a mute button so Alexa doesn’t listen!

I love my new Echo Show 8.  Also I was happy that I can go on you tube or ask Alexa to get recipes. Its nice to also have it be touch screen incase you can't think of the title if a song or something you just look it up.  The speaker has awesome sound quality. Shipping was super fast.  Set up is so easy walks you through it and it only takes 5 min.  Very user friendly and has excellent voice recognition.
Amazon got it right with the Show 8. Perfect. Good size screen. Graphics are perfect. You can turn off more with this than I could with my Spot.
I’ve had my Echo Show for a few months now and just love it.  I don’t know that I need it but I wanted one and very pleased.  Alexa mange’s my home very well.

I have 5 of them, my problem with them is they turn on automatically from time to time. I have Satellite and it’s metered. Please is there anyway to only have them turn on when you want them to. That or put a line of code in, to not turn on unless directed to or password protect it. I like them except for that major flaw. If that’s corrected l’ll buy a couple more. Amazon customer service is normally exceptional, so please take care of this.
My favorite Echo Show yet. The sound and video quality are great. The integration with the smart home devices  my video cameras work perfectly.
I enjoy my echo show 8. Sounds great. Integrates with my smart devices. Only don't like the constant line on the bottom show what Alexa can do.
Small enough footprint to fit on my desk where the Original Show 5" was.Sound is better by a bit, screen seems a bit better as well.

On connecting with ring doorbell, I was expecting video to be displayed as soon as someone rings the doorbell. I got this to help my kid see who was at the door before opening. But it defeats the purpose if we have to ask alexa to show who is at the door. Google hub has this feature with its nest doorbell.
I really liked it but it died in 3 weeks,  going to be fixed.  Not happy, they shoould have just given me a new one after only 3 weeks.  I did not get a choice so I will hope for the best.
I really like being able to look over and see the weather when ever I want. I am still learning to use it. I am sure once I figure it all out it will be fabulous.
Just received the device yesterday. Set up was super easy. Went into settings and go it just how I want it. Next test is to send a call to mom. Will update.
Bought the 5" originally and had problems with it and way too small. Ordered this 8" and so far it is excellent, what it was advertised as.
Love it! The sound is so good on the speaker.I often find my husband playing songs and singing the lyrics as they show you the words.
Randomly intermittently stops responding to voice trigger wake word 'Alexa'. Have to keep unplugging and replugging from power to reset it.
Love it and it works with my Nest doorbell and thermostat.  Love the stuff that pops up on the screen.  Gives me more ideas of things I can ask it.  Love that weather is on screen too.

I love it. Mt Ring camera responds to it better than on my phone for live view.  Sound of music is nice even at full volume . Some song have the lyrics displayed like karaoke.  Same when playing trivia games,  sometimes I don't understand stand Alexa when shes saying some words, but that me .
The time display will not stay large , photo on ad shows large time display, need  magnifying glass to see this WANT TIME TO STAY SO I CAN SEE IT really frustrating ‼️
Really love this device.  It’s perfect as a bed side alarm clock.  Voice recognition is much better than the 1st gen Show and the Echo Dot.
This is my 2nd Echo show, the 1st being a Echo Show 5. Picked it up on a Xmas sale for 59.99. Wished I brought 3 more for the price and replace my Echo Dots. Screen picture cannot be beat.
Nice big screen brite colors and very sharp images you will love this size and the sound is awesome. You won`t go wrong with one of these shows
The bass is huge which I like. I got because it was on sale and to put with my Ring. Perfect. Both. But the echo show is great now I want more.

Great purchase.  We just added the echo 8 to our collection and could not be happier. Fantastic alarm clock. Love to listen to music in the am so works great for me.  Not too overwhelming but all the wonderful benefits of echo family.

To be honest when I bought it I thought it was the small one but turns out I bought the big one. I have had three upgrades of alexas and this one is one of the best. It sounds great and has good base.

Echo show 8, Love it. The display is a lot better than the echo 5. Still have not played much with it but I like it so far. Like that it comes with a camera that you can disable if you don’t want it on, unlike the 7” google display that does not come with a camera. If I am not mistaken, You have to go to the more expensive google max to get a camera. If you are on the fence just go for the echo show 8.

It integrates with my other smart home devices.  It makes calls with a higher voice quality than my cell phone.  It controls the things I tell it too when I tell it to.  I was not in favor of getting one of these - it was a gift and we love it.

I did the trade in program and updated all of my echo devices. I had a 1st gen echo in my living room and I enjoyed the sound quality. I wasn’t sure what to expect with the show8, but I’m pleasantly surprised.
Way to much one sided news ads
Love the bigger screen and the better sound quality. Voice recognition: I might need to work with it but it seemed that Echo Show was better.
We control our lights, watch out remote cameras,  listen to radio, watch YouTube and movie and video chat with out friends.  Meets all our expectations.
It can be annoying when it starts talking without anyone saying alexa as it seemingly reacts to some other spoken term that sometimes comes from the TV.  Otherwise works well.
Love the 8" screen. Great for the price. Does what I needed it to do. I wanted to talk to and see mom. Watching a show while cooking is a plus.
Show8 moves to the top of my list of innovative devices. I would like to see more videos available, like HBO MAX, and other payed programming.
This is a must have for every home.  I love watching  amazon prime while did my heavy duty holiday cooking.  This is a must have for this new decade.
Me and my husband weren’t into the whole Alexa thing till I gifted him this. We are OBSESSED. Love having the screen to look at too! I highly recommend!
We purchased this for the kitchen. It's small enough to not get in the way, yet, large enough you can see recipes clearly  while cooking. works great for us.
I love it. I can ask her anything and I get the right answers all the time.  If your by yourself  this is great you can talk to Alexa she will keep you company.
Got it in February and not working today. The bad thing is I don’t know how to contact to get it replaced or repaired. I will stick to a brick and mortar store!
Purchased this as a gift for daughter. She loves it! She has no complaints as of yet. Pulls up recipes while she is cooking and baking pastries!
Our 3rd Show unit... 1st died and was replaced... this one (Show #3) will not connect with our other 3 Alexa units to form a multi-room music group... and transmits audio poorly to other Show units.

I love the sound quality of this speaker. Not a big fan of ease of use & playing videos like YouTube & asking questions compared to google home hub. This doesn’t work very well with Google Nest either
I suggest buying the book that reveals all of the great ways to use the Show 8......I bought it as a gift and now I am considering the purchase of the Show 8 for myself
Great picture. Easy setup. Easy to use. Also purchased them for our sons families so we can do video calling with them and our grandchildren.
Much better screen resolution and sound than the echo show 5 that it replaced.

Liked the sound quality, Amazon could have better selection of easy listening music and sleeping music,and I downloaded Pandora but can't get it connected. Alexa says she sent app. but PC does not have it as one of my devices. Have older Amazon Fire and it sent it but does not connect. Got it for the drop in room to room but when it's on hear all room sounds all the time, so something not connected right. Like that it gives weather,  time, and lowers sound.
The Alexa 8 is a good size on the kitchen counter. The sound quality of music is wonderful. I like the shopping list and her info on cooking has been helpful. Love her.

I received mine today. I am pleased with the display, the sound, display and other things. But the thing I don't like is there in no way you can not turn off the "Try Alexa, to do this or thing like that. I also have the Show 5 ant the firmware in it is much better then the Show  8. I am thinking about returning my 8 and get another 5 for this reason .  I have seem many reviews complainning about this issue. Get your engineers busy to fix the firmware and soon. It will increase sales to the Show 8 over the 5.
Love this little guy! Sound is great, my vacation photos in a slideshow keeps me smiling, and video connection with my kids is the best. 5 stars

Awesome little device ! If you like  karaoke this device will show the lyrics to songs, which can be lots of fun . Or you can watch a movie while in the kitchen. It connects well to other devices so the same music plays on all your devices at the same time , as it’s probably described already.

I bought this 8” show to connect my blink cameras too it was a breeze I already had a Dot .. The show is doing very well it’s working great. Definitely worth the money I can’t even watch YouTube on my google browser and Alexa even does my search love it

Great device that we bought as a christmas gift for the kitchen but turned out to be so handy. Easiest way of maintaining shopping list, checking what's on your schedule daily and checking the weather before heading out. Being able to have a picture slide show going also makes for a great conversation piece - im addition to playing music, control other Amazon products throughout the house. Very happy with our purchase. Thanks
displays ads when all I want is a large time and temp. All it seems to display other tan ads is a small time and temp not utilizing the whole screen

The device works fine.  Just was extremely disappointed that we couldn't play any music without paying a monthly fee to Amazon, unlike the Google Hub we previously had which would play just about any music without a monthly fee.  Only switched to Echo Show in order to have a device that was compatible with the Ring doorbell and camera system--according to the Best Buy Techs anyway.
I thot we needed to join the Alexa generation.......not sure why we needed it.  We ask the weather, listen to music, so far not much more.  It is ok.  Sound is high quality.
Upgraded my aunt and uncle to an ‘Alexa with a face’ - they are very happy, the screen helps my older relatives use it more easily. Great price!

This thing is amazing. I have it connected to two other Alexa devices. I can listen to my XM radio on it and watch Amazon prime movies on it. The sound quality is amazing. I'm highly impressed with this purchase. I bought it for my wife for Christmas but wish I had one.
Still trying to learn how to use and get visual phone calls and trying some of the other features, some working some not yet. looking for a simple instruction manual
I am very pleased with my purchase. Sound quality is perfect, set up was super easy, video is perfect. Love listening to music all day while I am home cleaning. You will not be disappointed.

I really do enjoy this device and am impressed at the abilities of Alexa the sound is pretty decent the only one little flaw I found on the home screen is you have to clock and you have the weather but in the upper right corner it should have the date like Sun 1/5/20 kind of a deal-breaker in a way that's the first thing I noticed when I after I set it up there was no date just a time in the weather

This is an awesome addition to our home. We love to go to sleep to thunderstorm sounds. We ask it goofy questions and love hearing Alexa response.We enjoyed ours so much we got echo dot for family. They use theirs for grocery list, music, and to find out near facts.
Better apps with youtube apps tv and regularWay to automatically turn off screen after defined period on inactivity
Great device, but I wish Alexa had the bandwidth for more than one user - we have a two family household, and in public spaces, it would be nice to access music from more than one account.
I LOVE having this. Never bought it because it felt unnecessary - I was wrong. Love the integrations with Ring and being able to check on the cameras while I’m busy cooking.
I love that when listening to music, the lyrics are on the screen.  I have not used it to watch prime or netflix shows yet,  but its good to have that option.
I find this product to be very useful and easy to use.  I still have a lot to learn about how to get the most from it.  Too bad you have to pay for a book to learn more.

For now I am only using to monitor security cameras, connects 8 Foscam cameras via Foscam cloud apps and Foscam skill and it works great, wish they show day and date at the home screen and drop the suggestion.

As usual Alexa gives me the information I am looking for. I really like that the screen shows the now weather. When you play music it shows the lyrics, which is really nice if you like to sing along or use it for Karaoke. Also, any important news pops up on the screen.
Setup was simple and uncomplicated.  I just love it, unbelievable all the things you can do on it.  I recommend this product to everyone, definitely the 8" Show is the one to buy.
I love this echo. I can see my pictures and listen to music at the same time. I also like getting recipes, news and the weather. Great buy for the price.

I most appreciate the fact that so far it has played constantly without suddenly stopping! My Echo would always stop playing and it was so annoying!! It’s also cool to see the lyrics. I had no problem Bluetooth it to my Bose speaker. So far I am very happy I bought it and would recommend it.
These is the 4th Alexa in our home, but the first Alexa Show. We are a fan and looking forward to also purchasing the Echo Show 10 in the near future to put in our kitchen.
Very happy being able to call my parents on it. Speaker volume can go very loud, great. I do wish it scrolled through my photos faster when not in use.

I was prepared to really hate this gift. But I love it. It is so much company. I ask it questions. I play trivia games. I listen to my audiobooks. It helps with recipes and halving recipes. It plays any song I want to hear. It plays my podcasts. It keeps me in touch with my grandson. It takes pictures. It is the ideal thing to have during a quarantine!

When I ordered this product the ad said I would receive an ECO Dot "free".  That did not happen.If you are going to scam folks, thinking you have enough to offer this then run out,...then STOP placing the ads.
Great sound I love the Alexa Show I started with the 5" one my mom loved it so she got the 8" one and when she got hers in the mail I loved the one she got so I bought one haha love it!!!

I can’t express how much I like this one, I wish I would have brought this one first. The sounds is great, I like that I can load my pictures on there, and I like that I can look up recipes.  I really like it.

Very cute and love having it in my kitchen. Sound quality is really good! Some of the voice commands are a learning curve. For example, you have to ask Alexa to open prime video before asking her to play a movie etc. The music lyric feature is fun and finding new skills is cool too.
I have convinced my 3 of my Neighbors to get one, a lady in the store and I brought one for my Mother in-law I love this thing.

I bought this for father-in-law in nursing home.  Things tend to "walk away" there for a number of reasons.  This device doesn't even have a simple computer type locking option.  No way to prevent theft at all!  How could designers not think to put a simple locking pin location on this.  I'll probably be returning it unless I can invent some way to secure it.  Very disappointed.
Small yet packs a solid bass and clear sound, responsive and screen adds functionality to the smart speaker part.  Enjoying music and videos
Nice big screen and big sound. It does have trouble hearing sometimes. The dots I have throughout the house have better voice recognition.
So far I love my Alexa smart display I was sick when it arrived, but since I am better I actually having fun with it. I love all the different thing it can do.
Had enough difficulty in getting this up and running that I had to enlist help. The sound quality is much better then my old Dot but I would be willing to pay more for better sound.
Best Purchase Ever, allows me to Drop in and see my elderly aunts are ok..and gives them a way to stay "connected" in these difficult times!
This is my second Echo 8. My main use was accessing my ring cameras but now I’m using it to try new recipes. Finding new ways to use it daily.

Sound quality, WOW! Love this Echo Show. Price was great, deal was even better during the holiday season which made it a no brainier. My first Echo and I loved it so much I got my family 2 echo shows for other family members, and added a Dot and Flex to my own home. The picture quality is amazing on the 8" screen, sound quality is absolutely surprising and fills an entire Master bedroom without breaking a sweat.
Love my echo.  Interactive information.It’s so easy to ad new things .
I love the echo show 8.  The only problem needs more work is the pairing this with the Arlo Cameras. It’s really hard to get that to work.
I love the Alexa show because I can call others as well as see them larger, I can ask whose at my door because it’s connected to my ring system.

This product is fun for solo use. But we bought it to communicate by video with an elderly relative who does not have a smart phone and is isolated in an assisted care facility. We have not, so far, been able to hook things up to to talk with him. So frustrating, and the sales materials do NOT make the smart phone aspect clear even though they emphasize communicating with elderly people as a plus of the product.
I love it that I can read the lyrics. That is the best part. What I don't like is that I don't have enough time to enjoy it more then I do.

it was good to try but not as i was expecting, the integration with ring door did not work very well since i could not see the camera on the screen, it will time out every-time i try to ask to see the camera, but i can see it on the phone.

I was gifted recently with an echo show and to date have not been able to use it for the purpose intended.  It tells me to download the Alexa App.  There is no link to it so where do I find it?  Further I have an LG Smart Phone and cannot find the App on it.  If you are going to sell a product to complete certain tasks send step by step instructions on how to use it.  I wish to see and speak with my Grand Child who has a sister unit.

Perfect display to sit on my desk. Small enough to not be in the way and large enough to clearly see video from my Ring doorbell or security cameras. The integration of a physical slide to cover the camera is a nice carry over from the 5in versions. The privacy of a physical camera cover makes this a viable option for a bedroom or anywhere privacy is desired.
The size is great but sometimes when listening to music it stops and starts for no reason. There are times when it just make noise on it own
Considering the amount of data collected, these devices should be priced much lower. If I could, I would return this and just get a better bluetooth speaker.

I received this as a gift, to replace an echo dot. It is a very nice upgrade, especially for playing music. The video aspect is interesting, but I haven't tried it much, yet. All in all, a good upgrade.
I use it for my shopping list, I watch amazon videos on it when I am in the kitchen cooking, and so much more. Love this device. Happy I bought it
I am really enjoying this device. It was easy to set up and very helpful to have the screen visual. I especially like the song lyrics!!
Happy with hardware quality, video and sound. Which I didn’t have to purchase adjustable stand. Good screen for viewing Wyze and Yi IP security cameras.

I'm a web/software programmer. I received my device, followed all setup instructions. Could not make a video call.Spent over an hour online with Amazon support. Still can't make a video call. In the meantime, Amazon downloaded ALL OF MY CONTACTS info.
Alexa is struggling. She doesn't always answer and she gets it wrong more than right. I have other echos and don't have this problem.

I was not disappointed with this product. Easy to set up. Does everything that I wanted the echo show to do. Not disappointed at all with suggestions at bottom of screen as stated in previous reviews. I was able to view all cameras, call contacts, and the biggest item was to put recipes for my wife in kitchen as she cooks. Could not be more happy with product. I would love to have two more echo shows for house.

Excellent product. The sound and picture are much better than expected and the reaction time of our requests is great. I see some complaints with the scrolling suggestions but for me this feature provides some good insight of what Alexa is capable of that I would not have thought of myself. Plus, there is a feature to turn it off if you wish.

I Love this Echo 8, so far everything is working fine and truly beyond expectations. I can do so many things that I could not even get close to accomplish before, everything from alarms and interactions with my other smart devices, the amount of skills is incredible and the convenience in size, screen clarity and sound performance will make anybody love this new Echo device.
I now have 3 of the Alexa show's.  They are great when you wan to see who is at the front door or any camera synced with the Alexa app.
Love it!! Amazing sound. It’s pretty loud. Still messing with it but it’s pretty awesome. I have one in my room and one in the kitchen. They have a cover for the camera as well.

Constantly has software issues no matter how many resets you do. Amazon seems to want to stick people with defective devices and hope they get annoyed with support so they don't have to exchange them. I don't have time to run through very basic trouble shooting with a very basic tech wasting my valuable time. When they start paying my wage at my job I can help them trouble shoot their poorly designed products.
So far we are loving our Echo 8. Its fun to be able to see the grandkids while talking with them. The music sound is great as are the recipes!
Love it , bought it for my mom to see pictures of the grand kids , she also sets medication reminders and loves the oldies music she can find.
Crisp display, compact size, surprisingly good dual speakers, operates mostly like Alexa.Video operating system awkward, nascent.

The echo works just great, I was thinking to buy a bluethoot speaker and it changed my mind, if you want a great speaker this is not what you are looking, but a good speaker that helps as a smart hub, stop looking

The Echo Show - 5 was purchased for my husband by his daughter as a Christmas gift (2019) so he could visit with his grandchildren over the miles. I was so impressed with it, I bought one for my son and one for my mother so we could all connect and watch my granddaughter grow. It also helped to keep us connected and together while being apart during the CVOID-19 outbreak. Thank you Alexa - Thank you Amazon!- Karry Brennan

I received my Echo Show and completed setup in about 15 minutes. I could link it to my home alarm and camera without any problem. The Echo Show 8 speaker is nice, good sound quality. Overall, it' s worth paying for the box that does many things for what you need.
This is the Goldilocks size. Not too big, not too small, it’s just right.  Great sound, excellent screen.  Get the tilting stand and you’re all set!

Im on my second device. The first was defective, they told me there was something wrong with the hard drive. They sent me a second one and it has the same problem . I cannot pull up any videos, recipes, etc.. This is a waste of time and money. There are way too many options out there to have to constantly be shipped defective goods from a company. This one is going back as well .

Perfect size. Would definitely make an easier option to not have all the notifications pull up. Turned them off in options but some still come up. And disappointed there are not tons of options for clock faces/options
It has a hard time picking up voice commands sometimes but the sound quality is great. Also love the recipe suggestions and news snippets.

Ahhh I could go on and on about this. We were a house full of the Alexa Echo and dots and used them daily, now with the show, I couldn’t imagine how we ever did without it. We play trivia games, I make shopping list, look up recipes, how to videos... I even FaceTime my sister while cooking and more. Seriously makes doing life so much easier. Show is on my list for all kinds of gifts and would recommend to alll!

This product is wonderfully built, looks nice, sounds great. HOWEVER, it has an extremely difficult time recognize our voice like the old one. It’s feels like it doesn’t catch anything we say or if it does, it doesn’t give us the right results. It’s been frustrating to say the least.
Under the selections segment it states, as a choice "100 Greatest Motown Songs" but only 4 play over and over and over.  What happened to the other 96?  WORST INVESTMENT ANYONE COULD MAKE!
It is nice to be able to view my security cameras it has pretty good sound quality, if you were right by it I could see this being a good way to watch videos
I like this over echo show 5 actually unlike some other comments said. Good purchase as I traded in my old echo dot. Only improvement would be the sound quality.

The Echo Show 8 is a great way to catch up with my sister that I'm not able to see as often as I'd like.  I bought one for each of us this past Black Friday and now just love the chance to see her when I talk to her!  I was intrigued by the 'burned duck' commercial and the young woman's ability to connect with her father via video so when I saw the items on sale I figured it was the right time to buy the two of them.
I have an Echo Spot and a Dot, but traded the Dot in for this wonderful Show. I love it and it's nice to use it with my Ring doorbell.

We had the echo spot before, and upgraded to this Show 8.  When we play music, the quality is really wonderful.  Impressive for this device, I'd say.  Had a problem with it playing music at first, customer service reached out immediately and helped solve the issue. Happy, overall, with this product.
Great alternative to installing a flatscreen TV in a bedroom. I only need to use my prime video for movies & TV shows when I'm under the weather and the Echo Show is perfect.

Love the music quality. Love the play music overall devices at once. Love the interaction question and answer. Love the ability to control multiple light switches, ring camera, and home security feature. Alexa still has some problem understanding certain commands sequence of the English language like any alien would too. Alexa sometimes can’t locate answers from commands but am sure over time it would can learn to teach itself.
Love it. Already had echo dot which I enjoyed but this is way better. Great sound quality, works like a digital photo frame when I want it to. Does all echo dot did but better and a bit more on too.

Seeing the screen reminds me that I have Alexa right there to answer questions -- I would forget to use her when I just had the dot. I would prefer that there were speakers in the front though. The sound is the best from the back and with the screen in the front it seems silly. Speakers should be in front and back with majority of sound coming from the front.
Love it!! Love that I can see our kids, the weather, our pictures, song lyrics, shopping list, news articles, etc. Display and sound are great!
Awesome product, this is my fourth one!  Integrated with my smartthings, ring cameras and nest thermostats and fire alarms.  No google crap here

Ordered in November, not received until December 27.  Read reviews to figure out how to use her to my liking, i.e. how to avoid ads, etc.  only shows time, temperature, and rotation of my photos, until I ask for something.  Well pleased with her.

We bought 3 of these devices (Echo Shows) to communicate among family in Michigan, Ontario and British Columbia.  We have had a great deal of difficulty getting them to work.  After a couple of weeks of tried and error and limited success and with meaningful support unavailable, we are now planning to return them.
This thing looks and sounds awesome. Easy setup, ordering linked to your amazon account helps speed that up. This thing is pretty cool.
Fun. I bought one for my daughter in law for Christmas and she surprised me by getting me one! We both love it! Lots of great features.
Love it came today and already love using it. We upgraded from the echo dot looking forward to video chatting with my momma who lives in another state

Connected to many of the devices we already have, the ring and our thermostat. Kids love asking alexa to tell them jokes. I do wish there was some built in way to change the angle that it sits. Built to be at counter height but we put it on a shelf.
It's a very user-friendly products once you initiate the first Alexa in your house any additional Alexa you purchase all you have to do is plug it in it automatically program itself superior product
Didn't know what I wanted for my Birthday so I told my wife about this.  Wow, this is some product.  Easy to install and works fantastic.  Its a must for Birthday / Christmas or Chanakah

It is a fascinating product, very easy to use and really very efficient if you can create an intelligent environment in terms of devices around you controlled by Alexa, it is expensive to achieve it but little by little you can build it and get to have a smart home, if you can  do it believe me you won't regret it

This has been a fantastic addition to our household. The Kitchen "Appliance" I never knew I needed. When my husband gave it to me for Christmas I was a little skeptical. It has been beyond helpful with recipes, timers, music, weather etc.

5 minutes after I unboxed my Echo show8 I had everything paired together and started playing. I drove my wife crazy with Alexa turn off the fan, turn on the lights. Check front door, play music, Alexa , Alexa, Alexa.I have to change the name now because my wife is sick of Alexa. Over all  this is a great product for both fun and convenience and I highly recommend it to anyone. If I had to complain about anything, well I can't.

Voice recognition is still a challenge. Overall I recommend this as the 5 is small n works best as alarm clock substitute as opposed to a tv alternative as well as smart home controller. I have 2 8s 2 5s 2 show second gen and 3 dot gen 3s. They all are unique and worth the $. But the 8 would be the choice if you are only getting one on a budget.
Great for the kitchen... easy to view recipes and you can watch shows. The only downside to this echo is the sound can be kind of hollow.

Love the music; hate the political pop-ups. Obtaining current local weather is outstanding. The morning alarm is wonderful. Everyone should have one of these devices. Mine was a  birthday gift from my granddaughter!
I love it!  I love seeing the photos from past vacations, especially now while being quarantined.  I didn't know how much I enjoy it. I may buy a smaller echo for my bedroom.
Product fits well in our kitchen. Easy to add to our Amazon echo setup and extends the voice recognition to that part of the house great.
We have 2 and love them! They synced easily to our security system and audio doorbell. The screen size is perfect. I like how you can shut the camera off.

Wi-fi and Bluetooth connections are easy to set up.  Screen size is great for armchair viewing of videos.  With separate low, mid, and high audio frequency gain controls even standalone sound isn’t too bad.  The introductory price of $100 was great too!  Unlike the 10 inch Echo Show it doesn’t produce multichannel surround sound; otherwise, I would probably give it five stars!
Love it.  We put this unit in our din between my wife and me, it has changed our lives.  We ask questions all day long.  It's like we are now geniuses.... so much fun.
I was debating between this one or the show 10 and I’m glad I chose this one.  Blends with the decor and shows pictures which I love even more.
GREAT
The audio quality on this is great. The devices hears me throughout the room easily and the screen size is perfect. I much prefer this over the show 5.
I love to listen to music throughout my day, and Alexa finds any song I can think of.  She also answers questions for me without having to surf the internet.
I'm just getting accustomed to the echo eight response is terrific the sound is amazing for such a small device but ill know more as I become more familiar with it I'm sur
The only knock is that the screen sometimes comes on for no reason and you have to keep telling it to shut off.  Not sure why it does that.

I have 10" shows and 5" and not 8" shows, and this is my favorite size.  Not to large to sit on my nightstand but big enough to easily see in the middle of the night if need be, like the Ring alerting.

What absolutely blows my mind is that the latest version of Show (which I got for Christmas) does NOT display the date! It is always connected to the Internet, it is monitoring the date so it can provide information about appointments, etc. This is ridiculous and very disappointing! Seems like a no-brainer...c'mon Amazon...provide a patch and fix this gross oversight!!!
I'm so glad I purchased this! I love having it in my kitchen to follow YouTube while i'm cooking a new recipe. So worth the purchase.
I love the idea of this and what can be done with it but I feel like I shouldn’t have to have the volume past half way to before it can be heard decently.Apart from that we love it.
This was added to my 2 other Alexa dots.  Great addition.  Better voice quality.  Better voice recognition.  Added cameras and an August door lock which made everything about better
So much fun to use for music, knowledge and videos. There are to many things to list that the Echo Show can do, just know it is fun and useful.
I bought this for one of my son's and his family so they could communicate with his brother and myself during this Covid-19 quarantine and they love it.  The cousins are enjoying seeing each other.

Love my echo Show 8! No complaints! I have it in my kitchen and I watch shows on Hulu while folding laundry and doing other chores in there. The screen is perfect for that. The sound quality is really good also. I highly recommend!

Set up was easy!  I'm hoping to see more apps integrated for Alexa access like Netflix, Pluto TV & Disney+.  Haven't made first video call yet.  I did learn Alexa will not sync with your phone's contacts. You have to manually add contacts you want to communicate with in the Alexa app.
It works well.  We haven't used it a lot yet waiting for my daughter to move. That is what we bought it for to be able to see the Grand kids and talk to them.
Echo 8hd was above expectations. The picture is so clear as well  as the sound is clear.You can ask Alexa to do a lot of things on it.
Love this so Galen I bought it . Looks great in my kitchen large screen size is nice. Voice integration is perfect. Sound is better than Echo Show 5 .

Great product. Needs to have the ability to be able to pull up kindle book or other literature and have the ability to read instead of the device just reading aloud.This option would make the device and cooking better.
Was a gift for an elderly person who is hard of hearing.  Difficult to hear; too many features for an advanced senior.  Had it sent back to the person who gave the gift.  Just too much to absorb.
This unit has excellent sound and video display.  Seems to have a few functions that are new.  Voice recognition still imperfect.

Really limited functionality. Just wasted my money. Spotify works only if you have the premium. Spotify free works great on iPad. Sound output low. Have not found what this thing is useful for. The show in the name is just that. For show.

I thought it was going to show the camera pictures from Ring.  It just tells you when something sets it ( ring) off. I just hope Amazon will find  something useful for it to do besides  how to cook when I don’t cook.
Love how big it is really easy to read. Sound quality is good. The big screen is easy to read in the middle of the night. It does take up some space but it’s worth it.
The unit started up with Spanish as the language and the time zone in France, or it appeared as the result of errors input during start up. All these were corrected using the Alexa app.
The Echo Show 8 is my new favorite Amazon device. The larger screen and vastly improved sound are definitely a industry achievement.

I like my Show for sure but was a little disappointed that it wasn’t the bigger show !! I was thinking I was buying the largest one .. That is probably my fault but it should say mid size or something .. another thing is I want home screen on at all times or at least when I am around ... nothing anywhere tells us it is light affected .. I like my room dimly kit so my home screen turns off in less than a minute .. I just feel descriptions of product should be more clear !!
Has trouble connecting with devices. Even when I’m right next to it, the echo in  other room has an easier time hearing my voice. Was a mistake to buy it.
What an upgrade from the Show 5. Sounds amazing, the screen is nice and big and the voice recognition is so much better then the Show 5

For $80, this thing is insane!! I use it for my alarm clock that is amazing and has a TON of customization! I love how I can view my RING cameras and my WYZE camera from it as well. The sound quality is also awesome for such a small unit. Thank you!
I use it for information, recipes etc.  I can control the lights and thermostat from the living room or from the app on my phone.
It was everything I expected it to do. With my 95-year-old mother in a nursing home, I can talk to her face-to-face during this pandemic.

Got a great price on a Black Friday deal. I initially wanted the Echo 10, but the price was not right. It seems to do everything the 10 does, except the camera does not follow you around when you move.
The perfect show. Sound is really good...screen size is perfect for me, not too big or too small...works well in a smart home setting. I wouldn’t trade it for a different size or features.
I had hoped that she could completely control the TV thru voice with the right remote.  But I purchased the remote but that is not the case. 🙁

Placed it in the eat in kitchen. Works nicely to bring up recipes, call other family devices to video chat with other family members not in the house, and for playing music. Love it and it gets a lot of use. When the camera is not in use you can disable it with a switch and cover up. Privacy is key.

Documentation shipped with product and in app is extremely limited. Very hard for a newcomer like me to understand. I still can’t get the darned chyrons at the bottom of the screen to turn off, so now it’s a digital picture frame brick endlessly and annoyingly hawking Alexa features I have no interest in. Has all the hallmarks of either a product released prematurely or designed by people who have no regard for expanding the Alexa user base.
Upgraded from last version and notice a remarkable sound quality difference and microphone is much better at understanding speech
When I ask it to look up a business that is not in my contacts it is unable to find it.That's very frustrating because all of my other Alexa's are able to do so.

Love these! Bought 3 at xmas & gave to family in different states  so we could talk face to face! The sound quality & picture is great! I listen to music all the time as well & love that it shows u the lyrics to songs when listening to it! Many different easy ways to use! Highly recommend!

Bought this to allow my wife to see and communicate with people at the front door (Ring Doorbell), so she could either tell them to wait for her or allow herself to not have to get out of bed. All the other features are bonuses: music, question of the day, recipes, weather, etc. Love it!!!!!!!!
Love this device! We have this one in the kitchen and use it for everything from the weather, timers, recipes, seeing who is at the front door - awesome product

The show 8 is the perfect size to use on my kitchen counter, it does not take a lot of space and is easy to see.  The sound is excellent and alexa always finds what I need.  I really enjoy using this.

I would love this so much more if I could add the day and date on the background where the time and temperature is. I can with My Show 5 but not with the 8. Don't know why the Amazon folks overlooked this detail. If you're listening, Amazon (which we know you are), is there a way to update the software to fix this glitch? Otherwise, I'm a happy camper.
There is a little bit of a learning curve to some of the features (setting up for drop in calls) but it is easy to set up.  There are many videos online to help with special features.

Alexa is very smart and it’s awesome to play your favorite tunes or set a timer at a moments notice.  But, sometimes Alexa gets lost and says I can’t find that or mis hears your request. A work in progress I suppose.  We will continue to learn all she can do.
We are never disappointed in our Alexa devices. As the technology advances it gets smarter too. We love it and highly recommend it.
I Love this wonderful echo show 8, I also have the 5 and both are great. This is my new go to gift for friends and family it’s the greatest!!!
The screen size was much better than the 5" Alexa Show. The sound is very good also. We appreciate the Ring Camera integration, so we can view the Ring cameras while we are at the basement bar.
The device works very well for us and we like the connectivity we have with our daughter and family. We really haven’t used most of its features yet but we will eventually.

Really like it, I wish there was a way to completely turn off suggestions, you can turn them almost all the way off, but not completly, so its not as annoying. Video and sound quality is good. Would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for the suggestions.
So glad I got this Echo Show 8.  It was very easy to set up and I've automated quite a few things.  Love the way it displays my photos too. Great purchase.
This is way beyond what the original Show was. The audio is better, the picture is better, the style is better, and so much more.

We really like it.  Husband had to have one for his man shed!  I main one for the house we move it around various places!  Love feature of being able to see lyrics!  Sound quality is great!  Convince is great.
This was a gift from my mom and it is fun!  I have mine in my kitchen and love the music and ability to make a call without picking up my phone.

I bought this for the kitchen.  I have an Echo dot and wanted one with a screen  I love it!  I put my pictures on Amazon Prime and now they scroll as a screen saver - can see my grandchildren while I cook.  I really like the screen for time, temperature, recipes, etc.  I like everything about this new toy!

Very good!  Ive had no problems other then twice having to restart when the sound disappeared.  Only had it for 2 weeks so I havent been able to use every feature.  I would recommend especially at the sale price.
After getting out first Echo we were hooked. Now we have a smart house. Echo devices make all the difference between embarrassing and awe struck. Keep up the amazing work.
Love it should have got one along time ago and if you buy the extra attachments you can turn your lights on all over your home.Love it.
The sound is amazing. I love it. Thinking about getting my mom one actually. So the grandkids can call her anytime and video chat.
I am probably bias as I have an Echo and the Dot.  The screen is cool although I haven’t been able to do a visual conference yet.
There is very little desirable content and they seem to have no intention of ever improving these. Alexa is a very poor smart home solution in general.
Great quality product, created photos slide show, great sound, love how it shows the weather when asking alexa the weather. Wish the clock was bigger and in the middle at night!
I was looking for a echo with a screen. This product has a lot more functions then I know it even had. So happy with my purchase.

I first purchased the Echo with the 5” screen but gave it away for the 8” screen because I thought the clock display would be larger and I keep it across the room from my bed and larger numbers would be easier to see.  When in the “night” mode the clock display is rather small, but it’s a good product that works well. Alexa hears me from other rooms.
I think the speakers and sound quality are amazing...but making the echo do things requires VERY precise voice commands which are not natural.
AFTER HAVING ONE - I HAD TO HAVE TWO! THE BEST. I LOVE IT...ESPECIALLY THE WAY IT INTERACTS WITH THE RING DOORBELL AND STICKUP CAMERAS.
Sounds very good for being so small.  Setup has gotten exceptionally EASY.  Options are well designed and add to the experience.
Similar issues as to the dot. It has problems interacting with other apps not tied to amazon.Screen and sound are great though if you're listening to music or similar.
I love the speakers on this. Some of the songs have lyrics so you can sing along. The volume is great, too. But, answering the tv is kind of scary when you are not expecting it! MUTE!!

We have become spoiled with our Alexa family. The new Echo Show has been a great addition. From accessing our outside camera’s to pulling up recipes or adding items to our shopping list, Alexa is always there for us.

I purchased my Alexa only 3 weeks ago and haven’t used it to its fullest capabilities with integration.  I need to get a booster to extend my WiFi so that I can use Alexa the way i planned.  I do love that that you can tell Alexa to play a certain type of music and she’ll find a station.  I’m out numbered by males in my house and it’s great To have a female friend around.  So far I love it!
This was a gift for my husband for Christmas. It’s really nice. He loves it. I highly recommend it for those who love electronics.
Love this product! The screen size is great (8 inches) and picture quality is perfect. Very easy to integrate with Ring, outlet devices, etc.
I love that I can tell it my random thoughts and it puts it on a list/calendar for me (shopping list/to-do list/events). I am so much more organized!
Wow! Alexa you have our done yourself. This is the ‘perfect everything’ for recipes, monitoring, movies, and more. The sound is amazing on this product and the picture quality is beautiful!
It's a great smart display and speaker for my kitchen. The sound quality and display resolution are much better than my Echo Show 5. The build quality is solid as always. Love Amazon's device.
I love my Echo show. This is the fourth one I bought. I have in all my bedrooms and one in my kitchen!! Group them together and shows who is at my front door linked to my Ring!!!!

I bought this echo show 8 for my mother for mother's day. She loves it as much as I do. It is in our kitchen and has great volume and I love the features that it allows us to do. The downside of the Alexa/echo overall it has to be connected to a wall 24/7. Also that you can't make regular calls to people without an Alexa. Other than that Love this product and recommend anyone to buy it.
I like the Alexa device, Echo Show. It eases loneliness and provides an added layer of information & entertainment. This device improves the quality of my life.
There’s nothing I don’t like about this. I love it.! It’s clean and clear with a big touch screen. The speaker is awesome.!Alexa is like a friend to me now.
I recieved this as a Christmas gift. I like it but im still trying to figure out how to use some features. I look forward to using it to call family on it to see how that works
Don't really like the fact that when I'm trying to get the Echo in the dining room to play, Echo Show starts up so we have to move closer to the Echo

I love our Echo Show 8. My favorite feature is the continuous changing of pictures from the album I created. Also, love the music feature. Ex: music for dining, music for cooking, or music for cleaning.❤️❤️❤️❤️

This is such a great addition to my kitchen!! I can watch tv shows on it and listen to 70’s rock as well. The only criticism I would give is that my daughter is named Alexa so I wanted to customize the name to Luck and I was only given three other choices.
I love this product and use it many times throughout the day; from watching news, to dropping in on my Grandkids, making calls, and quick calculations for work.
I really like my new Amazon Echo Show 8, but she does not understand me all of the time, maybe she doesn't understand Hillbilly.
Absolutely love it.  My husband who isn’t technically savvy is using it all the time.  Definitely one of the best purchases we’ve made

Great product. All the people who have Alexa-enabled security system love this product even more. It shows you front door and can talk to stranger through your Alexa. This is simply amazing. I can not express how much I love this product. I addition, my little son keeps on asking Alexa to play his favorite songs and cartoons. Best product I ever had. It understands your kind of sound.
Works great - needs other people to have one so you can talk between them, but the functionality is great.  We use it for picture slideshows similar to the old digital picture frames

The capabilities of the Echo Show are substantial. Have it sitting on my office desk and it looks and sounds great. We could see it placed in a variety of rooms including a bedroom since it streams Prime Video (as well as other services). Love it.
New technology was given to us from our daughter and son-in-law, we live it.  She set it up for us and it is really easy to use.

Fantastic voice recognition despite it's playing loud music, however the video stutter a lot. May need a little faster processor. Screen resolution is good and solid sounds quality.It's great as an regular echo, but mediocre as an Echo Show.  Got it as a trade in with the original Echo.

I love it. I placed it in the kitchen and use it to listen to all my favorite music while cooking and cleaning. I love the recipe feature as well. The sound quality is awesome and when volume is loud it comes close to the quality of a Bose. Very pleased with purchase.
Nice to have music that shows the words to the songs. Visuals when we ask about news, weather and recipes are useful. Touch screen is helpful also. All in all a good upgrade to the Alexa line.
I like the echo show for the most part. But.. the mic does not pickup as well as the spot. it has a hard time with differentiating ambient sounds from my voice.

Works great for us. Nice sound, helpful information. I use it as an alarm clock. It goes nearly completely dark at night. Before the alarm goes off in the morning it lights up very brightly. Then the alarm comes on to our preselected Amazon Music channel. Only thing I wish it did is display the time on our ceiling like our old alarm clock. Had to keep the old alarm just for that purpose.This has been a great gift!
pretty cool device if which I am still learning
I can’t load my contacts from my iPhone. Tried different methods nothin works. I purchased two for my sons yet I can’t randomly call them.
Sound is great nice screen much better then the show 5. Same size screen as the 1 st. Generation show but smaller case very nice.
My brother has one and I wondered if I would ever use it if I got one.....I definitely love it and use it all the time.  I have it show me my ring doorbell on it. Love the big screen
Set it up for her in a few mins. She is not a tech person but easily discovered how to make use of it quickly including use of Alexa
Love these ease of use. I love the fact I can drop in on my mom to check in her on treatment days. It is the best way for my sister and I to see how she is doing
Was very pleased with this product especially the sound quality when having it play music or show movies also acts as a very good tablet

Well I do really love this thing but sometimes it feels like I have to yell at it just to listen to me, that might just be me but I don't know. Gotta say though how loud this thing is, is amazing, maxed out the bass and just love how it sounds. Also the fact that it has a screen so you can do other stuff makes it even better.  Still slowly figuring out all the other options and I'm kinda excited to see what else there is for this thing.
I have 2.  One with a screen and one without. I love them both. I love being able to listen to my music anytime!! I love being able to have questions answered.

Bought it to go with our Arlo Camera system.  Works great with the camera but can't get it to work to show the doorbell footage.  Amazon is supposedly working on a fix?!?!  Will see.  Even still, I like the product and would buy again.  Love being able to turn the microphone and camera off.  Goes to a black screen automatically at night that displays the time.  Handy little thing.
Use this Alexa device to stay informed about the Weather and other things. It is a great link to my home for automation! Very Pleased with it's performance. Also like the recipes .
This is a sharp looking unit with a bigger screen than the older show it replaced. The picture is sharp and the sound is clear.
I bought this as a gift for a friend.  She had had nothing but good things to say about this.  She loves how it sits up. She truly couldn't be happier. Great for recipes or steaming.

I really like playing music and having the lyrics displayed. Not all songs have lyrics but modt on Amazon music do. Just be sure to turn off the "Do Not Disturb" setting or the lyrics will stop and screensaver will appear while the song is still playing.

I love this device! I got it primarily for the video call feature to connect with friends out of state. The sound and picture quality is great and I love that it can connect to my Spotify so I can listen to music while I work.
This is our 4th Alexa product, absolutely love the sound quality in it, voice recognition is great and screen quality is amazing. Very pleased
Still getting to know all the skills Alexa can have available for you, but I'm enjoying having all types of music at my command, and using the timer and lights on/off features.
I have own 2 other Alexa , but this one is the worse i Ask her to play music she responded ok play, but nothing play.  Try many times, still nothing happen. I m returning this.
My wife love this thing.. she talks to it like it’s real person.. which is great because now i don’t have to listen to her.. 😂
LOVE my Echo shows!!!  I have three & love that I can go anywhere in the house & get my music and answers to myquestions.
I wouldn't have ordered this if I'd known I wasn't going to get the reimbursement for the echo show 5 I returned, SO now I have 2!
Good product

This alexa device is for sure one of the best, i would highly recommend alexa. HOWEVER  she is a bit slow with the questions and not as reliable as I hoped, but she does help out with recipes as thats what she mainly shows

I am familiar with the Amazon products and this one is very good.  I purchased this product over the speaker because it was advertised as being able to ask Alexa to display "the front door camera."  For security reasons, VERA won't allow cameras or locks to be controlled by this project.  Controlling my lights and thermostat works but wish I could see who is coming up the walk.

I've bought other Echo products in the past but this one is the best so far.  Really like the large screen and the sound is amazing.  I mostly use it for music but when I do need to know something Alexa is always handy to answer my questions.

Product is ok.  Not what I expected.  Good luck trying to return.  I had to call customer service to request a UPS pickup.  They processed the labels twice now and they didn’t have enough common sense to use my residential address.  They keep sending UPS to my p.o. box.  Seriously give the staff some training.

Found that this was obviously much louder than the echo 5 and the screen is better. So if you are a light to decent sleeper you may not need this. Only issue I have is that they took out the alarm clock visually on the home screen that is on the echo 5. So a smaller space or room go with the 5. Larger space the 8 is a must-have.

Great little device with surprising sound quality and many features.  Overall a helpful tool in the kitchen and bathroom thus far. Clearly room for a few improvements, including the needed addition of a usb port, but all that will be corrected and featured on the next generation of the “Show”...the “Show More”...?
These are great to have around the house. Works with my Nest Thermostat, Blink Cameras, and Ring Doorbell. Very nice to make a smart home.
Love the Show 8. Sound quality is excellent and watch the song words on screen make it fun to sing along. Easy to set up and easy to use. Weather reports and controlling devices are easy to do.
Best gift ever! We love this! Great for recipes and news and weather and everything in between.  Totally recommend this product
By far the worst Alexa device we’ve ever purchased. She can’t answer or hear the simplest questions. Couldn’t be more disappointed with an upgrade.

The Echo 8 has been a good addition to our home.  it is so convenient to walk by & see the current time, temperature & news!! I admit I need to experiment more with the settings & enable it to be more integrative with other devices & also to show more information!!

The main reason I wanted one was for the kitchen, so I could put my recipes on a screen whilst cooking. Sadly I have to jump through several hoops to get one recipe on at a time, and Alexa doesn’t want to exit the app half the time. So I use it for music I stead
It’s nice I like itNeeds work on sound I was watching YouTube and
Adds real depth to our Echo collection. We are running 100s of photos thru background - we normally would not see them. Very happy

I use it as a timer, to show me who is at the door through my ring doorbell (so I know whether to answer) and to read recipes to me as I cook, to show me what is on my Google Calendar for the day. I am always finding new uses for my Alexa.
I’m sure there’s enough detailed reviews, but I’m super excited to have this and communicate with my family who are far away!
Have to be right on top unit for Voice Recognition to work
Love this product. Received it as a gift for Christmas and it gives me news, music, weather, who musical artist are and the words to the lyrics play with the song.
I really enjoy having the Show in our kitchen. It works very well although sometimes Alexa doesnt always acknowledge we spoke. Other than that we love it! Great sound!
Received it as a gift!! Face time calling is great! It’s great to look up recipes. There’s step-by-step instructions for all the recipes. Listening to music or just asking Alexa a question!! Love It!
I love the easy set up and all the options to choose from.  I look forward to experimenting with more options.  Love it so far.

I'm pleased with what I saw when my daughter set it up for me.  But now her two day stay is over and my memory (90 years old) isn't what it used to be.  I wish there was an on line video to enlighten me.
Do not know whether mine are defect. But sometime it does not respond to voice command, unlike 2nd or 3rd generation echo dot.
Love this!  Great for recipes while cooking and baking, music, shopping list, and best of all seeing and talking to my grandkids.  Best gift ever.
The sound quality is really great. Way better than google. However, I prefer google hub because the google assistant is much smarter than Alexa

I upgraded my echo to echo show 8 and I like the screen aspect of the Alexa but I don’t understand why stand is not included, there design makes stand a necessary thing but it’s sold as a accessory which is not fair !!
It’s neat, we’ve put it in the kitchen for recipes and stuff, but haven’t fully utilized all its features because were the only ones on both sides of the family that has one Lol
Far field recognition is horrible, hardly hears you. What's the point in having such a device? My 5 year old echo was so much better, i should not have upgraded. :(
I love the fact that it is integrated with all of Amazon Prime. Since I don't have a smart phone I can't take advantage of some of the features

Fits the need superbly! Perfect size to have on a counter top without clutter. Provides an physical access point to Alexa routines and alexa enabled devices. Awesome add on to the ecosystem in my house. Displays amazon photos on screen together with sports news/score and stock market info which is a nice touch. Pairs well with zigbee enabled echo.

WE GOT THIS ECHO SHOW 8 AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FROM OUR SON AND DAUGHTER IN LAW ,,, WE ABSOLUTELY LUV IT !!! THE SOUND IS AMAZING, YOU CAN KAROKE,,,AND YOU CAN HAVE PRIME MUSIC !!! FIND AND MAKE A RECIPE ,,WITH PICTURES,,,WE CAN TALK AND SEE AT THE SAME TIME TO ANYONE IN OUR CONTACTS,,,, ITS JUST THE RIGHT SIZE,,, IT TELLS US THE WEATHER, IT HAS ALEXA!  YOU CAN WATCH A MOVIE EVIDENTLY !!!! WE WONT GIVE IT AWAY TO ANYONE AT THIS POINT !
Put near my mother, who is 84 allowing us keep communicating with her from work, home, and she loves alexa music, on prime
I never thought I would really enjoy this but it is a blast! I am enjoying the music, recipes, and everything about Alexa!

I just got my Echo Show 8 and I am flabbergasted that I cannot customize the home screen with the date, day of the week, or even a stationary view of my weekly calendar. This thing has so many cool features, how can the simplest of content not be accessible. I’ll provide an updated review if the developers improve the customizable options for the home screen.
I cannot believe what this can do.  I have had an for a long time, them got the Spot and thought I was really living (lol).  But I simply love the show.  For the price, it can’t be beat!
This is a significant improvement in sound quality with deeper, full bass and crisp highs. Very good decision to trade up.
Why not let the user remove the "Try this............." on the bottom of the screen.  It is annoying and I do not find it useful.
I love this echo 8. I have the 5, big difference in size and the price was amazingly affordable. Great buy for yourself or a gift. I def. recommend.
Decent value. Would be nice to have default volume. Maybe it can do that. Always adjusting volume. Stands are too expensive.
My family has enjoyed upgrading to this Echo Show but the home content has frozen on the screen many times instead of continually changing to the next screen.

Dont expect this to work with your ring device very well. When I ask Alexa to show me my ring doorbell camera when someone is at my door, if it happens at all it takes several tries to pull up the ring camera even though they are supposed to run smooth together.

This is great for doing face to face with the kids who all have iPhones and I don't. The  sound quality is outstanding. It is the best instrument I have ever used for a conference call. Hooking it up to other appliances has been a challenge  at times (most), but, I'll give the appliance the benefit of the doubt and say at this point it's my lack of technical skills.
I almost went with the Show 5, but the 8 is just what we needed. Great display, sound is why more than expected, and it looks good.
Great looking screen is good sound as well. I love the way it gives you suggestions. It’s a lot of fun you should try it
First Alexa device we have purchased, and it has not let us down! Awesome sound quality and it gets loud. The touchscreen works great and we are happy to add it to our household.

The Echo Show 8 has a great display, love the size.  It has great sound and is really great to play throughout the entire house.  Always great to be able to ask Alexa things vs having to use my phone or laptop and going to Goggle. It has been a very easy piece of technology to introduce to my 85 year old mother.  She actually hates most technology as she finds it challenging.  Using her voice alone is so easy and simple for her.
In my opinion, this is one of the best personal assistant devices with a screen available, especially if you use Amazon services. Good size and sound for the price.

This is a pretty good product! I wish it had netflix and disney + added but hopefully that will come later. Of course prime video is available and just recently hulu. I like that you have the option to close the camera. To me the only con is because of the way it’s designed the screen tilts back so when in a video call it can be tough to angle the camera .
Still learning all the features but so far it definitely meeting our expectations.  We do enjoy the Amazon Photo connection for slide shows.

I had the echo dot for the longest and my friend gave me the echo 8 show and Omg what an amazing upgrade!  It sounds like a large stereo and the video is amazing.  If you are thinking about an upgrade don't hesitate you will love the echo 8 show, I know I do.
Like the photo gallery, ease of setup, and the overall intelligence of this unit.  Aldd Ss o sad puns quality is good.
I watch shows on it and listen to music. Great sound! I love this so much. Watch movies and ask questions and listen to music.
Alex had a problem in recognizing my youngest sons voice.  Alex thought my youngest son was my oldest. Other than that it is great.
Love the list making.  And then I can see instantly on my phone when at the store.  Fun to learn new things.  Not so thrilled with the choice of recipes it pulls up though
We bought this primarily to monitor our Ring video doorbell & it is very convenient for that as well as being entertaining & knowledgeable. We like it.
